findings.title: Missing negative tests for several assertions
findings.description: The Paraspace protocol lacks robust negative test cases to prevent vulnerabilities from being introduced if developers unwittingly remove or alter checks during development.

findings.title: Use of a magic constant with unclear meaning for the sAPE unstaking incentive
findings.description: The value 30 is used as an unstaking incentive without being explicitly marked as a constant and lacks a comment explaining its meaning, leading to potential user misunderstanding.
